data.title: Full Utility B Site Scale Hold Nanoswarm
data.description: Lock down the B Site and threaten Attackers successfully towards the entrance of B Main. This setup fully commits to B Main, so becareful towards any potential players taking Market.

data.title: B Main Hold + Turret Market
data.description: Cover B Main with Alarmbot and Nanoswarm, while your Turret covers Market.

data.title: Elbow Hold + A Link Turret
data.description: Cover both sides of A Site with this full util lineup, allowing you to handle a push from either side.
